about_the_game:
This token pack contains 42 tokens: Goblins, Kobolds, Gnolls...


This token pack includes:

  • Bugbear Archer
  • Bugbear Mace
  • Gnoll Sword
  • Gnoll Axe
  • Gnoll Archer
  • Gnoll Sword and Shield
  • Goblin Archer
  • Goblin Dog
  • Goblin Mace
  • Goblin Rider
  • Goblin Shaman
  • Goblin Shield and Dagger
  • Goblin Spear
  • Goblin Worg Rider
  • Goblin Dog
  • Goblin Ghoul
  • 2 Kobold Shaman
  • Kobold Shortsword
  • 2 Kobold Spear
  • Lizardfolk Axe and Shield
  • Lizardfolk King
  • Lizardfolk Shaman
  • Lizardfolk Spear and Shield
  • Lizardfolk Two Handed Axe
  • Lizardfolk Wrestler
  • Ogre
  • Ogre Barbarian
  • Ogre Mage
  • Ogre Merrow
  • Orc Axe
  • Orc Axe and Shield
  • Orc Spear
  • Orc Sword
  • Orc Worg Rider
  • Troglodyte
  • Troll
  • 2 Troll Armored
  • Troll Hunter
  • Troll Scrag

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on May 25, 2014. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.0.10 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
